document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Celebargiolestes Kennedy, 1925 (Odonata: Argiolestidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Celebargiolestes Kennedy, 1925 (Odonata: Argiolestidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
1♂ (holotype), 1♀, Mirahassa, (IRSNB); 2♂ (holotype of
C. karny
i: JvT2391; paratype of
C. karnyi
: JvT6661 (head lost), incorrectly labelled as Java (see introduction), collector unknown; 1♂ 1♀, Ile Ile, 500−800 m a.s.l., G. Heinrich leg. (appendages missing); 6♂, Tondano, Manado, C. van Braekel leg.; 2♂, Pineleng, Manado, 250 m a.s.l., L. Coomans de Ruiter leg.; 1♂, Mapanget, Manado, 06-vi-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg.; 1♀, Pineleng, Manado, 250 m a.s.l., 08-vi-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg.; 1♂ 3♀, Road to Mapanget, Minahasa, 23-vi-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg.; 2♂ 3♀, surroundings Ranotongkor, Minahasa, 300 m a.s.l., 02-viii-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg. (JvT6476) [cf. description of this specimen below]; 1♂, Lake Lahendong, Minahasa, 700 m a.s.l., 18-viii-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg.; 3♂ 2♀, Waterfall Tondano, Minahasa, 600 m a.s.l., 03-ix-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg. (1♂ in CUMZ); 1♀, surroundings of waterfall Kakaskasen, Minahasa, 600m a.s.l., 26-xii-1940, L. Coomans de Ruiter leg.; 3♂ 1♀, SW of Luwuk, Totop Camp, along Batui river, lowland rainforest, 120 m a.s.l., 19-x-1989, J.P. Duffels leg.; 2♂, Batui, NNW of Batui river at Singing camp, middle sized stream through primary forest, fast flowing with quiet sites, 90m, 15−17-x-1989, J. van Tol leg.; 1♂, Batui, between Sinsing camp and PT Delta, forest stream, 50−100 m a.s.l., 18-x-1989, J. van Tol leg.

2♂, Dumoga-Bone National Park, spring area along tributary of Tumpah, 260 m a.s.l., 22-iv-1985, J. van Tol leg.; 1♂, Dumoga-Bone National Park, tributary of river Tumpah, 230 m a.s.l., 20-v-1985, J. van Tol leg.; 6♂ 1♀, Dumoga-Bone National Park, brooklet crossing Huntuk trail, 1 hour from Edwards subcamp, 650 m a.s.l., 28-iv-1985, J. van Tol leg.; 8♂ 1♀, Dumoga-Bone National Park, brooklet W of Edwards subcamp, 700 m a.s.l., 04-vi-1985, J. van Tol leg.

1♂ 1♀, Manganitu, riverine gardens, coconut plantations, secondary forest, 10-v- -1985, F.G. Rozendaal leg.; 1♂ 1♀, NW slope of Gunung Sahendaruman, SSW of Liwung, 600−650 m a.s.l., 12−19-v-1985, F.G. Rozendaal leg.
